name: RoomTemp
comment: raw value current room temperature and sensorstate (without any correction)

name: HcRoomTempDesiredAdjustable
comment: room temperature setpoint is currently adjustable

name: HcActiveSpecialFunction
comment: if unequal zero a special function (e.g. holidays, floor pavement drying â€¦) has been activated

name: OperatingMode430
comment: operation mode of the heating circuit for 430

name: SelectedHc
comment: number of heating circuit to which this remote control is assigned

name: StackeBUSTaskMax
comment: maximum number of bytes needed for the eBUS task stack

name: StackMainTaskMax
comment: maximum number of bytes needed for the main task stack

name: StackLifeCheckTaskMax
comment: maximum number of bytes needed for the life check task stack

name: VariantDKRefreshCnt
comment: counts how often variant ID has been corrected

name: FiFoResetCnt
comment: counter how often eBUS Fifo was cleared
